name: noxoa
description: Full-stack Product Management System with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run preview" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
